name: Tanks of Two Kingdoms
description:
This is a game for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1. 

The game is about you defending your kingdom against a mightier kingdom, and hopefully in the end, you might even conquer that kingdom. Only time will tell, and remember,  the fate of your kingdom lies in your hands!

Helpful tip: Go to the about page in the game for more info. If you are clicking buy tanks and it is not working, move your cursor closer to the top left corner and click again.
